name: Gregory Tribute 40L Travel Pack - Women's
description: Blurring the line between pack and suitcase, the Tribute is a no-compromise solution for travellers. A wishbone wire frame transfers weight efficiently to your hips, and makes it versatile enough for trails and all-day exploring. A travel cover fully encloses the pack and suspension system, but has a zipper – with lockable pulls – for access to the straps. At 40L, it's a convenient size for overnight trips and get-aways when you don't want to check a bag.Made of 210-denier nylon with a water-resistant polyester lining.Lightweight perimeter wishbone frame distributes weight evenly to hips.Perforated foam with moisture-wicking mesh on body contact points for cooling.Foam padding on the exterior protects your pack in transport.All-round zip opens up entirely like a suitcase.Zippered, odour-resistant, waterproof compartment for dirty shoes or wet clothing.Top zippered pocket for essentials.Front mesh pocket fits a jacket layer.Waterproof, seam-taped travel cover keeps your stuff dry and protected.Internal zippered quick-access security pocket,Padded handles on three sides,Integrated safety whistle on sternum strap.Ergonomically shaped zipper pulls.Max recommended load is 16kg.
